metadata.title: Effects of Seafloor Sediment Composition, Depth, and Food Availability on Groundfish Distribution

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC)

metadata.description: To investigate the effects of seafloor sediment composition, depth, and food availability on groundfish distribution.
